search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Voicenotes (voicenotes.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: I could not find the official pricing page for Voicenotes on their website. You can check directly on [voicenotes.com](https://voicenotes.com) for more details or try navigating their help center for specific pricing-related information.

[Introducing Voicenotes Pages. Publish your voice notes.](https://voicenotes.com/pages)

Voicenotes
==========

##### Voicenotes is an award-winning AI note-taker to record your thoughts and meetings, remember everything, and get insights right when you need them.

Mobile

![Image 20: download voicenotes for Mobile](https://cdn.voicenotes.com/assets/landing-v2/download-resource-mobile.png)

Mobile

[iPhone](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/voicenotes-ai-voice-notes/id6483293628)[Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.app.voicenotes&pli=1)

Desktop

![Image 21: download voicenotes for Desktop](https://cdn.voicenotes.com/assets/landing-v2/download-resource-desktop.png)

Desktop

[Mac ETA: late April](javascript:void(0))[Windows ETA: late April](javascript:void(0))

Watch

![Image 22: download voicenotes for Watch](https://cdn.voicenotes.com/assets/landing-v2/download-resource-watch.png)

Watch

[watchOS](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/voicenotes-ai-voice-notes/id6483293628)[WearOS](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.app.voicenotes&pli=1)

Web

![Image 23: download voicenotes for Web](https://cdn.voicenotes.com/assets/landing-v2/download-resource-webpage.png)

Web

[Web](https://voicenotes.com/signup)[Extension](https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/voicenotes-ai-transcribe/ijhnkhjjjpoloniinkaobelgghfckiep?hl=en)

Features
--------

Voice Notes
-----------

#### Capture quick thoughts, daily reflections, new ideas, grocery lists, health logs, book highlights—anything. Just hit record from any device.

![Image 24: record](https://cdn.voicenotes.com/assets/landing-v2/feature-voicenotes.png)

Meetings
--------

#### Record in-person and online meetings in one click. Get a quick summary and full transcript. Works with all major meeting apps without a bot.

![Image 25: meetings](https://cdn.voicenotes.com/assets/landing-v2/feature-meetings-recording.png)

Smart Transcription
-------------------

#### Voicenotes is significantly more accurate than Apple and Otter. You can whisper, speak in 100+ languages, remember names, and more.

![Image 26: smart transcription](https://cdn.voicenotes.com/assets/landing-v2/feature-smart-transcript.png)

Ask AI
------

#### Your AI remembers everything you record. Instantly recall details and insights—like a second brain connecting the dots.

![Image 27: ask ai](https://cdn.voicenotes.com/assets/landing-v2/feature-ask-ai-create.png)

Share
-----

#### Record and share with your team—or family—in one tap. Sync or automate workflows with Zapier, Notion, and more.

![Image 28: share](https://cdn.voicenotes.com/assets/landing-v2/feature-share.png)

Private
-------

#### All data is encrypted at rest, never used for AI training, and only accessible via your authenticated request. GDPR compliant. SOC 2 (via Vanta) in progress.

![Image 29: private](https://cdn.voicenotes.com/assets/landing-v2/feature-private.png)

Use cases
---------

### Personal life

Voice journaling — Reflect on your daily life, keep a gratitude log, and build a personal library of memories—all in your voice.

Doctor appointments — Doctor’s advice or therapy breakthroughs, record and save your treatment plan, crucial advice, and takeaways.

Voicenotes, this year’s Bootstrapped winner, is one of those ‘how did I live without this?’ tools, turning your voice memos into searchable notes.

![Image 30: voicenotes review by Product Hunt](https://cdn.voicenotes.com/assets/landing-v2/user-review-1.jpg)

Product Hunt

Creative ideas — Ideas strike you at odd times—whether you’re a writer, creator, entrepreneur, or hobbyist. Capture more, faster, without typing.

Lecture notes — Never miss a lesson. Capture lectures and class discussions, share your notes with your friends, and split the bills.

Home projects — Record and remember plumber/electrician instructions, keep track of quotes, and manage home projects.

I LOVE the WhatsApp integration... I tried it immediately and it almost made me crying. I took an old vocal note on WhatsApp from my youngest daughter and shared it to the Voicenotes WhatsApp chat I have and... bang onto Voicenotes and forever with me :)

![Image 31: voicenotes review by u/fettuccinaa](https://cdn.voicenotes.com/assets/landing-v2/user-review-4.png)

u/fettuccinaa

Record & preserve memories — Cherish your stories, heartfelt WhatsApp chats (send to Voicenotes’ bot), or your grandmother’s recipes—in their original voice.

### Teams & Work

Sales & client calls — Keep context at your fingertips. Remember pain points, opportunities, takeaways, and follow-up details to seal the deal.

Project progress logging — Track what you did, what got stuck, and what’s next. Works just as well for coding sprints as it does for side projects or for your woodworking project.

Brilliant assistant. Been using this to take my meeting minutes and it’s so good at capturing all of the points and making me much more efficient in my life!

![Image 32: voicenotes review by Katiealh](https://cdn.voicenotes.com/assets/landing-v2/user-review-3.png)

Katiealh

Customer support — Capture real customer voices—feature requests, bug reports, or frustrations—without losing the nuance. Share with your team to build with empathy and ship the right fixes.

Team management & collab — Quickly log context on each team member—wins, blockers, and next steps. Share updates in your own voice to keep everyone aligned without long meetings.

Exactly what I needed to record and transcribe in-person meetings. This has met the need at a better price point (and with more effective single case use) than just about anything else.

![Image 33: voicenotes review by an0nym0us](https://cdn.voicenotes.com/assets/landing-v2/user-review-3.png)

an0nym0us

Interviews & recruiting — Record candidate conversations, note red flags or standout moments, and share takeaways with your team to make better hiring decisions.

EOD Reports — Wrap up your day with quick voice summaries. Capture what got done, what’s pending, and what needs attention tomorrow—without writing a word.

Pricing
-------

###### Individual

###### A second brain for your daily use.

$10 per month

$120 $69 per year

Unlimited notes & meetings.

Designed for personal & professional use.

Works well on mobile, desktop, and watch.

Community of 200,000+ note-takers.

###### Teams

###### Give your team the gift of memory.

![Image 34: launch-bg](https://voicenotes.com/_nuxt/limited-bg.DsTyFMeX.png)

Limited launch offer

$199 $49 per month  
for the entire team

Add unlimited users. No per-user pricing.

Record meetings without a bot.

Build your company knowledge base.

Up to 10,000 minutes. Add-ons available.

Intro to Voicenotes from the founder
------------------------------------

We’re committed to

We built Voicenotes for ourselves and decided to take no shortcuts. All notes are secured on the cloud, not used for AI training, and only retrieved upon authenticated user requests.

privacy,

Why is it so rare to see products older than a decade or two? We like products that last a lifetime. To avoid any external influence, Voicenotes is 100% self-funded.

longevity, and

We are designers first. We like to own and use simple, beautiful things. We go to great lengths to keep Voicenotes as simple as we can. And simplicity takes enormous time and effort.

beauty. Watch our [backstory](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XUOlQSlIUbI).

Watch
